content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a rental price of 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price agreed upon was 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Farhad Abbasi, as a 9. He was respectful, open to negotiation, and quick to agree on a fair price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
